ValidationRule.description:
To define the stage moment for hunters and prospectors. RO-551
Moved to "StageChangeRestrictions_SalesAgencyAcqu"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sales", ISCHANGED( StageName ),
OR(
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Not Reached Yet"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Qualified Prospect"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Currently In Contact"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Scheduled")),
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Demo Held") , ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Pilot Definition"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Offer"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Received ") ) ),
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Demo Confirmed"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Demo Held"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Pilot Definition"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Offer"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (StageName), "Contract Received")),
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Not Reached Yet") , ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualified Prospect"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Currently In Contact"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Scheduled") )))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the opportunity to this stage. Please use “Rescheduling” and “Demo confirmed” stages to switch the Opportunity type.
